CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Azure Central Bank relative to Stellar Futures Market?
SRP.A: Azure Central Bank is {above} Stellar Futures Market in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Azure Central Bank relative to Silverhaven Reserve Bank?
SRP.A: Azure Central Bank is {above} Silverhaven Reserve Bank in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Azure Central Bank relative to Aethelgard Financial Exchange?
SRP.A: Azure Central Bank is {above} Aethelgard Financial Exchange in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total interest rate?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Stellar Futures Market}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total interest rate?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Silverhaven Reserve Bank}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Borealis Investment Council's minimum Interest Rate in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Borealis Investment Council's minimum Interest Rate is in {1978}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Silverhaven Reserve Bank's minimum Interest Rate in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Silverhaven Reserve Bank's minimum Interest Rate is in {1986}.

NC.Q: Between 1979 and 1982, was the average total Interest Rate higher or lower than between 1980 and 1982?
NC.A: The average total interest rate between 1979 and 1982 was {higher} than between 1980 and 1982.

NC.Q: Between 1978 and 1987, was the average total Interest Rate higher or lower than between 1981 and 1982?
NC.A: The average total interest rate between 1978 and 1987 was {higher} than between 1981 and 1982.

NC.Q: Was the total Interest Rate in 1978 higher or lower than in 1981?
NC.A: The total interest rate in 1978 was {higher} than in 1981.

NC.Q: Between 1978 and 1987, was the average total Interest Rate higher or lower than between 1980 and 1987?
NC.A: The average total interest rate between 1978 and 1987 was {lower} than between 1980 and 1987.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Stellar Futures Market} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Stellar Futures Market and Borealis Investment Council first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Stellar Futures Market and Borealis Investment Council first exchanged leading positions in {1981}.
